CarryWeight Enchantments strength = divided by 3. (including unique items)

Light Armor Perk Unhindered: Weight of carried armor divided by 2

descriptionHtml:
CARRYWEIGHT CHANGES

PERK
    Extra Pockets From 100 to 30


Steed Stone Guardian

    From 100 to 40


CarryWeight Enchantments strength = divided by 3. (including unique items)

Light Armor Perk Unhindered: Weight of carried armor divided by 2
Heavy Armor Perk Conditioning: Weight of carried armor divided by 2


also i recommend set your caryweight to 150.
and install a backpack mod.
author: ELAF
